description:
Immerse yourself in a fascinating world of colored bubbles and puzzles in every level. Use the solar laser to aim and shoot to make the game convenient for people of all ages.

At each level, new surprises and challenges await you. You can use fireballs to break through all obstacles, and rainbows will help you explode large clusters of bubbles.

Get bonuses like plus 5 to get more balls and complete the level.

This game will help improve your child's cognitive skills and give you a lot of fun.
name: Easter Bunny: Bubble Shooter
